Precisa de mais atualizações e modernidade, mas eh CS né

they banned gambling outside of the game, then implemented gambling in the form of gameplay. Every team, duel you take is a coinflip determined solely by RNG. You win, you get to play another coinflip and you feel great. You lose, you get to play another coinflip except you feel like shit.

do not recommend this game to anyone who has any self respect, or anyone who is currently invested in another game. Don't waste your time or money.
such a fun game even though im bad
